DOC.brief_summary: The aim prospective vivo randomize clinical trial evaluate influence combination calcium Hydroxide ( CALCIPAST Paste , Poland ) chlorhexidine Gel 2 % ( Gluco-Chex 2 % , Cerkamed , Poland ) comparison calcium hydroxide paste ( CALCIPAST Paste , Poland ) Intracanal Medication post operative pain ( incidence , degree , duration ) reduction bacterial endotoxin ( quantitative ) endodontic treatment single root necrotic teeth . According inclusion criterion patient enrol study allocate randomly three group either combination calcium hydroxide paste intracanal medication 2 % chlorhexidine gel . ( group A ) calcium hydroxide paste intracanal medication ( group B ) mechanical preparation without intracanal medication ( group C ) endodontic treatment do two visit . The sample endotoxin divide three group : access ( S1 ) , mechanical instrumentation ( S2 ) , removal intracanal medication ( S3 ) , sample take sterile paper point introduce root canal work length 60 second . firstly patient 's medical dental history take . patient assign informed consent . anaesthetized access cavity perform root canal preparation do Revo-s system irrigation intracanal medication placement inside canal . patient 's record post operative pain sheet NRS 4 , 24 , 48 hour 2 week first visit . operator recall patient check record second visit After 2 week application ICM , rubber dam apply removal temporary dressing , sterile paper point ( S3 ) introduce canal irrigation removal remnant intracanal medicament saline solution . - Removal paper sample determine endotoxin concentration . - The canal obturate single cone technique use gutta percha point taper 0.4 % ( Gutta percha point , Revo-S MicroMega CO. , LTD , France ) correspond final apical size file root canal sealer resin sealer ( Adseal , META BIOMED CO. , LTD , Korea ) . - Pain assessed numerical pain rating scale ( NRS ) 14 day first visit ( day Obturation ) begin Obturation .
DOC.brief_title: Post Operative Pain Level Endotoxins With Calcium Hydroxide Calcium Hydroxide Mixed With Chlorhexidine Treating Necrotic Teeth
DOC.detailed_description: Medical dental history : diagnostic chart collect case report investigator confirm eligibility assistant supervisor . Radiographic examination : preoperative radiograph take examine tooth structure , caries detection , periapical status . Clinical examination : intraoral examination include visual examination caries , restoration , swell , fistula , mobility , percussion do . Diagnostic criterion necrotic tooth : 1 . The patient mark moderate severe pain numerical rating scale ( NRS ) horizontal line 11 mark 10 interval take number form 0 - 10 0 reading represent `` pain '' , 1- 3 reading represent `` mild pain '' , 4- 6 reading represent `` moderate pain '' , 7- 10 reading represent `` severe pain '' . ( record baseline degree pain preoperatively initiating endodontic treatment ) All step do operator . The measurement time 4 hour , 24 hour , 48 hour 14 day . ( Day Obturation ) 2 . The patient respond electric pulp tester high level contralateral tooth adjacent tooth contralateral one miss . 3 . Preoperative periapical x- ray film do detect periapical change . Intervention : Forty five patient include allocated random chance receive several clinical intervention one intervention control ( Group A ) patient receive intracanal medication , ( Group B ) patient receive intracanal medication calcium hydroxide ( CALCIPAST Paste , ( Poland ) chlorhexidine 2 % gel . ( Gluco-Chex 2 % , Cerkamed , Poland ) , ( Group C ) calcium hydroxide paste CALCIPAST Paste ( Poland ) . Procedure step : At 1st appointment . - Each patient give numerical pain rating scale chart order rate /her present pain preoperative pain - Anesthesia do Carpule 3M™ ESPE™ Ubistesin™ Articaine HCI 4 % & Adrenaline 1:100,000 3M Australia tooth decay use standard dental aspirating syringe . - After diagnosis disinfect tooth surface 30 % H2O2 ( Perfect Medical , Egypt ) follow 2.5 % NaOCl inactivate sodium thiosulfate ( El Nasr CO. pharmaceutical chemical ) . - Access cavity rubber dam isolation Sterile bur access cavity preparation distil water coolant flare do endo-z bur . - If successful anesthesia occur , work length determine apex locator ( Root ZX , J.Morita , Irvine , California , USA . ) confirm intraoral periapical radiograph ( Kodac Dental film , speed D , size 2 , Carestream Health , Rochester , NY , USA ) confirm length 0.5-1 mm shorter radiographic apex . - The first sample endotoxin ( S1 ) take sterile paper point access cavity preparation introduce root canal work length 60 second . - The sample place pyrogenic free plastic tube frozen negative 200c endotoxin determination LAL test . - Canal instrumentation do use NiTi rotary file system ( Revo-S MicroMega , France ) endodontic motor ( X-Smart , Dentsply Maillefer , USA . ) accord manufacturer instruction ensure adequate space placement intracanal medicament proper removal bacteria debris , till size AS 35 file . The rotary file introduce inside canal EDTA gel ( MD-Chelcream , META BIOMED CO. , LTD , Korea ) lubricant . - The irrigant solution NaOCl concentration 2.5 % tissue dissolve property file deliver disposable plastic syringe . - Another sample ( S2 ) take clean shape place intracanal medication sterile paper point endotoxin determination . - The first group subject combined therapy calcium hydroxide intracanal medication CALCIPAST Paste ( Poland ) , 2 % chlorhexidine gel intracanal medication ( Gluco-Chex 2 % , Cerkamed , Poland ) clean shape 2 week period . - The second group subject calcium hydroxide intracanal medication alone 2 week period clean shape . Calcium hydroxide form ready-made paste measure special syringe CALCIPAST ( Poland ) . - The third group receive plain cotton temporary filling without intracanal medication . - Placement intracanal medication lentuolo spiral low speed hand piece condense paper point . - Temporary filling do glass ionmer fill ensure proper seal leakage oral fluid inside root canal , may disturb action intracanal medication . - Pain assessed numerical pain rating scale ( NRS ) give patient complete home specify time 4 , 24 , 48 hour first visit . At 2nd appointment : - After 2 week application ICM , rubber dam apply removal temporary dressing follow previous infection control protocol , sterile paper point ( S3 ) introduce canal irrigation removal remnant intracanal medicament saline solution . - Removal paper sample determine endotoxin concentration . - The canal obturate single cone technique use gutta percha point taper 0.4 % ( Gutta percha point , Revo-S MicroMega CO. , LTD , France ) correspond final apical size file root canal sealer resin sealer ( Adseal , META BIOMED CO. , LTD , Korea ) . - Pain assessed numerical pain rating scale ( NRS ) 14 day first visit ( day Obturation ) begin Obturation .
DOC.criteria: Patients Good Health ( American Society Of Anaesthesiology Class II high ) . Adult patient gender older 1850 year old suffering chronic periapical periodontitis necrotic pulp . single root teeth ( maxillary mandibular ) . Patients understand numerical rating scale ( NRS ) Patients able sign inform consent Patients Vital tooth . Patients active pain one tooth . Patients take analgesic 12 hour precede preparation . Any type teeth multi root . Pulp hyperemia condition pulp necrosis like pulpitis previously access teeth temporary filling patient suffer chronic disease ( systemic disease ) . Pregnant mentally retard patient .
